categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic vehicles

nodes.text: The Scanner Jammer was a mobile platform produced by Loratus Manufacturing and used by the Rebel Alliance during the early stages of the Galactic Civil War.

The Scanner Jammer was designed with a variety of countermeasures to disrupt and jam enemy scanners and sensors. It also served as an effective intelligence-gathering device, with a secondary ability to scan any part of the battlefield for a few moments.
